SQL: SELECT P112.AREA_NAME,P113.MODEL_NO,P12.PIPING_MATER_CLASS,(P12.NOMINAL_PIPING_DIA-5000)/32, P12.LINE_NUMBER_LABEL,P12.LINE_ID,P12.FLUID_CODE, P12.LINE_SEQUENCE_NO,P12.TRAIN_NUMBER,P12.INSULATION_PURPOSE, P12.INSULATION_THICK,P12.NOR_OPER_PRES,P12.NOR_OPER_TEMP, P12.NOR_DGN_PRES,P12.NOR_DGN_TEMP, P12.TEST_MEDIUM,P12.TEST_PRESSURE,P12.PWHT,P12.PAINT_CODE, P12.PLAN_NO,P12.PID_NO FROM DD_{PROJECTNAME}.{TABLENAME} P12,PD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_113 P113,PD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_112 P112 WHERE SUBSTR('{TABLENAME}',12)=P113.PARTITION_NO AND P112.AREA_INDEX_NO=P113.AREA_INDEX_NO AND P112.DISCIPLINE_INDX_NO=1
